results.name: In binary representation: minimal number of editing steps (delete, insert or substitute) to transform n into n^2.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
example: a(7)=3: 7->'111', 3 x insert a 0 between the last two 1's:
